item.title: The MelodyBox
item.description: The MelodyBox is meant to give a physical support to music, as used to exist with vinyls and CDs. This requires two things : a physical object that can identifying music a reader which can read the music to play from the object and play it The object is an NFC tag, and the reader is an NFC reader coupled with a rasperryPi. What is convenient about this is that the NFC tag can be embeded in almost any kind of object, as long as it doesn’t intefere with the radiowaves used to read it.
